topics.body:
Question for you all: What is the most embarrassingly weeaboo thing you've ever done?

For me it was creating a character in Vampire the Masquerade who was basically Alucard and not getting for weeks why this was annoying the shit out of the other players and the DM.

Only reason he wasn't murdered by the DM? I min-maxed him to hell and back to make him as much of an unkillable combat monster as possible and the poor guy running the game was scrupulously honest and fair.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55595f1a63687254ac921500#post_55595f1a63687254ac921500
Well I used to take my copies of Shonen Jump to school with me.  I remember I took a copy of Fullmetal Alchemist with me and this SUPER religious chick sees me reading and notices one of the Transmutation circles. So she starts going on a fucking fit about how I'm in league with the devil and how I'll burn in hell and she's gonna pray for me. I just wanted to punch her.
